channel.title: Important Audio
channel.description: Sample Podcast Feed with a single episode.

item.title: Daniel Gross – How to Win
item.description:
This episode features Daniel Gross discussing strategies and insights on how to win in various aspects of life and business.
**Timestamps:** 0:00 - Introduction: Input != Output 4:04 - Overview of How to Win: sleep, food, exercise, mind, and leadership 4:34 - Sleep 7:00 - Food 8:49 - Exercise 11:43 - Mind 18:44 - Leadership 28:43 - Closing thoughts 33:45 - Q&A session begins 33:52 - What goes wrong transitioning to the startup roller coaster 35:41 - How to minimize time spent online 36:59 - Startup mantras 38:05 - How to find community and peer support 39:57 - Does this have to suck? 41:05 - How to pivot 43:38 - Managing risk 45:28 - Coordination between co-founders
**Links:** - [Sleep Like The Dead](https://sleeplikethedead.com) – recommendations to improve sleep quality - [Melatonin Article](https://slatestarcodex.com/2018/07/10/melatonin-much-more-than-you-wanted-to-know/) – source for 0.3 milligrams melatonin figure - [How to Get Startup Ideas](https://paulgraham.com/startupideas.html) – Paul Graham's article on startup ideas
